structure.title: IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF MUMBAI

content.facts: The petitioner was falsely implicated in a case of theft. The police registered FIR without proper investigation. The petitioner has alibi evidence and witnesses to prove innocence.
content.grounds: False implication. Lack of prima facie evidence. Violation of fundamental rights under Article 21. Abuse of process of law.
content.relief: Quashing of FIR and stay on further proceedings.
content.arguments: The petitioner was not present at the scene of crime. CCTV footage and witness statements support the alibi.
content.conclusion: The petitioner is entitled to quashing of the FIR.

raw_data.title: John Doe vs State of Maharashtra
raw_data.content:
IN THE DISTRICT COURT OF MUMBAI

FACTS:
The petitioner was falsely implicated...

GROUNDS:
False implication...

RELIEF:
Quashing of FIR...

PRAYER:
May it please the court...
